title: IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Field Helper, SRF & Other Posts

organizations.name: environment science and climate resilient agriculture

text: Click here for Sr Research Fellow Post Details IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Field Helper & SRF Posts: ICAR – Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), Katrain has invited applications for the recruitment of Field Helper & Senior Research Fellow vacancies for different projects on contractual, non regular basis. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 23-02-2017 at 10:00 AM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below…. IARI Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 03 Name of the Posts: 1. Senior Research Fellow: 01 Post 2. Field Helper: 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates maximum age limit should be 35 years for Post 1, 25 years for Post 2 as on 23-02-2017. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST/ OBC candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should posses Post Graduate in Agriculture/ Horticulture/ Microbiology/ Biotechnology/Botany or relevant Plant Science subjects for Post 1, 10+2 in Science/ Arts/ Commerce for Post with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may appear for interview along with relevant documents on 23-02-2017 at 10:00 AM. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 23-02-2017 at 10:00 AM. Venue: Seminar Room of the ICAR- IARI, Regional Station Katrain, Kullu, H.P.- 175129. For more details like emolument, experience, duration & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form – IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for SRF Posts: Division of Agricultural Extension, ICAR – Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi has announced a notification for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow (SRF) vacancies for the project titled “Convergence and Network Analysis of Extension Organizations for Enhancing Their Effectiveness in Pluralistic Extension Regime” on contractual basis. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 15-02-2017 (Extended to 18-02-2017) . Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IARI Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 02 Name of the Post: Senior Research Fellow Age Limit: Candidates age should be 35 years for men and 40 years for women. Age relaxation is applicable for SC/ ST/ OBC candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Sc in Agricultural Extension/ Agricultural Economics, Bachelor’s Degree in Agriculture and allied subjects. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may attend for walk in interview along with bio-data, original certificates, attested photocopies of relevant certificates from matriculation with copy of recent passport size photograph on 15-02-2017 (Extended to 18-02-2017) . Important Dates: Date of Interview: 15-02-2017 (Extended to 18-02-2017 ). Reporting Time: After 12:00 Noon Venue: Division of Agricultural Extension, ICAR-IARI, New Delhi-110012. For more details like emoluments, duration & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Corrigendum – IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for SRF & Lab Attendant Posts: Division of Plant Pathology, Indian Agriculture Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi has published a notification for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow & Lab Attendant vacancies under the National Agriculture Science-ICAR funded research project titled “Population diversity of banana streak viruses (BSV) and understanding the mechanisms of resistance to BSV in diploid seedy banana of North East India” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview on 23-02-2017 at 10:00 AM. Other information like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IARI Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 02 Name of the Posts: 1. Senior Research Fellow: 01 Post 2. Lab Attendant: 01 Post Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Sc in Plant Pathology/ Biotechnology/ Life Sciences with 4/ 5 years of Bachelor Degree or PG Degree in Basic Sciences with 3 years Bachelor Degree and 2 years of Masters Degree with NET qualification for S.No-01, High School for S.No-02. Selection Process: Selection process will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview along with application giving full details of academic records, experience & photocopy as well as original copy of the relevant documents on 23-02-2017 at 10:00 AM. Venue details are mentioned below. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 23-02-2017 at 10:00 AM. Reporting Time: Before 30 mins. Venue: Division of Plant Pathology, Indian Agriculture Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi-110012. For more details like emoluments & other information click on link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Research Associate Posts: Division of Genetics, ICAR-Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi has published a notification for the recruitment of Research Associate (Unreserved) vacancies in the NASF funded project entitled “Creating a fully characterized genetic resource pipeline for mustard improvement programme in India” purely on temporary & contractual basis. Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview on 27-02-2017. Other details like age, qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IARI Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Research Associate (Unreserved) Age Limit: Candidates maximum age limit should be 40 years. Age relaxation of 05 years for SC/ ST & Women candidates & 03 years for OBC candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Ph.D in Genetics/ Plant Breeding/ Genetics and Plant Breeding/ Biotechnology or Master’s degree with 4/ 5 years Bachelor’s Degree [Those with 3 years bachelor’s degree must have UGC/ CSIR/ ICAR & NET qualification or equivalent] & two years research experience. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview along with application in prescribed format, all the original certificates from matriculation on wards, date of birth certificate, NET/ equivalent certificate, degree certificate either original or provisional and one set of the self-attested photocopies of all the required certificates from matriculation on wards, an attested copy of recent passport size photograph pasted onto the application form, proof of experience & publications on 27-02-2017. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 27-02-2017. Reporting Time: 09:30 AM to 10:00 AM. Venue: Division of Genetics, ICAR-IARI, New Delhi-110012. For more details like emoluments & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form - IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Senior Research Fellow Posts: Centre for Environment Science and Climate Resilient Agriculture, Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi has issued a notification for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow vacancies for the project titled “Assessing water, carbon and nitrogen footprints of major crops in some selected sites of the Indo-Gangetic plains” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview on 21-02-2017 at 10.00 AM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IARI Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Senior Research Fellow Age Limit: Candidates age should be not more than 35 years. Relaxation for SC/ ST/ OBC & Women candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.E/ M.Tech in Remote Sensing/ Geographic Information System/ Geoinformatics or M.Sc in Soil Science/ Soil Physics/ Environmental Science/ Agricultural Physics with specialization in Geoinformatics/ Remote sensing/ Geographic Information System & First Division (60% marks) at post graduate level. For more information refer the notification. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview with 5 copies of duly filled bio-data, attested photocopies of all requisite certificates, originals on 21-02-2017 at 10.00 AM. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 21-02-2017 at 10.00 AM. Reporting Time: 09.00 AM to 10.00 AM. Venue: Seminar Room of Centre for Environment Science and Climate Resilient Agriculture, NRL Building, IARI, New Delhi-110012. For more details like emoluments, qualification, experience & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Sr Research Fellow Posts: Division of Genetics, ICAR – Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi has published notification for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow vacancies for the project titled “CRP – Biofortification in selected crops for nutritional security (Rice)”on temporary & contract basis. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 20-02-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below…. IARI Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Senior Research Fellow Age Limit: Candidates maximum age limit should be 35 years. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST & Women candidates and 03 years for OBC candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should posses Master’s Degree in Genetics/ Plant Breeding/ Genetics and Plant Breeding/ Biotechnology/ Life Sciences with relevant experince Selection Process : Candidates will be selcted based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may walk in interview with dully filled in application in prescribed format along with original certificates from matriculation onwards, date of birth certificate, NET/ equivalent certificate, degree certificate either original or provisional and one set of the self attested photocopies of all the required certificates from matriculation onwards and an attested copy of recent passport size photograph pasted onto the application form on 20-02-2017 Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 20-02-2017 Reporting Time: 09:30 AM to 10:00 AM Venue: Division of Genetics, ICAR-IARI, New Delhi – 110 012 For more details like emolument, experince, desirable qualification, duration & other information click on the link given below….
